meanings.definition: Refused to obey or comply with something
meanings.sent1: She defied her parents by staying out past curfew.
meanings.sent2: The student defied the teacher's instructions and did his own thing.
meanings.sent3: The cat defied gravity by climbing up the tree backwards.
meanings.sent4: His determination defied all odds and led him to success.
meanings.sent5: The rebellious teenager defied authority at every turn.

meanings.definition: Resisted or challenged something boldly or openly
meanings.sent1: The hero defied the villain's evil plans and saved the day.
meanings.sent2: The protestors defied the government's orders and continued their march.
meanings.sent3: The dog defied the rain by refusing to come inside and play in the puddles.
meanings.sent4: Her courage defied all expectations and inspired others to stand up.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber defied the dangerous conditions to reach the summit.
